meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Nepal, Mauritius, and the Seychelles.
meanings.sent1: In India, you can buy many things with just one rupee.
meanings.sent2: She received a rupee as a gift from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The rupee rolled off the table and into the piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: His words were as valuable as a rupee in a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rupee sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A coin or note of the value of one rupee.
meanings.sent1: He found a shiny rupee on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper handed her a rupee in change.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the rupee and ran up the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a jingling rupee in his pocket.
meanings.sent5: The old rupee had been passed down through generations, holding sentimental value.
